profile_photo.name: REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT IN BUENOS AIRES
profile_photo.position: Final work of EANT - Data Scientist career

profile_about.title: Introduction
profile_about.paragraph_1: If I had to buy a department as an investment, where would I do it?
profile_about.paragraph_2: The main idea of the work will be to predict the location of the property in which the greatest increase in the price will be obtained, for the following year, based on the recognition of the variables that determine that the increase is greater than a defined threshold.
profile_about.paragraph_3: The threshold is defined as the 90th percentile.

profile_base.title: Databases
profile_base.paragraph_1: Las bases fueron obtenidas de la web del Gobierno de la Ciudad y son las siguientes:
profile_base.paragraph_2:
- Departamentos en venta de Capital Federal durante los años 2007 - 2015
- Centros de Salud Privado
- Centros de Salud y Acción Comunitaria
- Centros Médicos Barriales
- Comisarías
- Establecimientos Educativos
- Estaciones de Subte
- Estaciones de Metrobus
- Estaciones de Ferrocarril
- Clubes
- Hospitales
- Cuarteles y destacamientos de bomberos de Policía
- Paradas de Colectivo
- Dependencias Culturales
- Farmacias
- Universidades

profile_quote.title: Favorite quote
profile_quote.quote: " No matter that few are your possessions and your money. Having a dog makes you rich. "
profile_quote.author: Louis Sabin
